Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 10-2015. A 15-year-old 
girl with Graves’ disease and psychotic symptoms.
Hazen EP, Sherry NA, Parangi S, Rabito CA, Sadow PM.

Erratum in
    N Engl J Med. 2015 Jun 4;372(23):2274. Dosage error in article text.
    N Engl J Med. 2015 Jun 4;372(23):2274. doi: 10.1056/NEJMx150019.
